member.name: T:Penguin.Cms.Web.DependencyInjection.ServiceProviderFactory
member.summary: A service provider factory that creates a new scoped Penguin DependencyInjector instance and populates it with the required MVC registrations from the provided service collection

member.name: M:Penguin.Cms.Web.DependencyInjection.ServiceProviderFactory.CreateBuilder(Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.IServiceCollection)
member.summary: Creates a dummy container builder and registers the required services

member.name: M:Penguin.Cms.Web.DependencyInjection.ServiceProviderFactory.CreateServiceProvider(Penguin.Cms.Web.Mvc.ContainerBuilder)
member.summary: Creates a new instance of the Scoped Service Provider

member.name: M:Penguin.Cms.Web.Extensions.EntityExtensions.TryGetGuid(Penguin.Cms.Entities.Entity)
member.summary: Guid.Empty if entity is null, else Guid
member.returns: Guid.Empty if entity is null, else Guid

member.name: M:Penguin.Cms.Web.Extensions.FileServiceExtensions.ContentExists(Penguin.Files.Services.FileService,System.String)
member.summary: Checks if a file exists on disk. This is here because IO on the disk is VERY slow

member.name: M:Penguin.Cms.Web.Extensions.IHtmlHelperExtensions.RenderPageIncludes(Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.Rendering.IHtmlHelper)
member.summary: Renders scripts and CSS tags for /page/url.css and /page/url.js if those files exist

member.name: M:Penguin.Cms.Web.Extensions.IHtmlHelperExtensions.PartialToString(Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.Rendering.IHtmlHelper,System.String)
member.summary: Renders the partial to a string
member.param: The current HtmlHelper from the calling context
The name of the view to render
member.returns: A string representation of the body of the rendered partial

member.name: M:Penguin.Cms.Web.Extensions.IHtmlHelperExtensions.IncludeCSS(Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.Rendering.IHtmlHelper,System.String[])
member.summary: Adds the given filenames to the back end list of CSS files to find and include in the layout
member.param: The current HtmlHelper from the calling context
A list of the filenames to add to the back end list of CSS files

member.name: M:Penguin.Cms.Web.Extensions.IHtmlHelperExtensions.GetFileService(Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.Rendering.IHtmlHelper)
member.summary: Returns a registered instance of a FileService
member.param: The current HtmlHelper from the calling context
member.returns: A registered instance of a FileService

member.name: M:Penguin.Cms.Web.Extensions.IHtmlHelperExtensions.UrlExists(Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.Rendering.IHtmlHelper,System.String)
member.summary: Checks if the current path exists under the wwwroot folder, using the registered FileService
member.param: The current HtmlHelper from the calling context
The path to check, relative to the wwwroot folder
member.returns: True if the resource exists in the registered FileService

member.name: M:Penguin.Cms.Web.Extensions.IHtmlHelperExtensions.IncludeJS(Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.Rendering.IHtmlHelper,System.String[])
member.summary: Adds javascript files to the cache to be rendered with RenderIncludes in the master
member.param: The javascript file name relative to /js or absolute

member.summary: Conditionally renders an Html Attribute with a value
member.param: a bool determining if it should be rendered or not

member.summary: Conditionally renders an Html attribute without a value (ex checked)
member.param: a bool determining if it should be rendered or not

member.summary: This empty class is required to create an instance of the ServiceProviderFactory
